content: Machine Learning Researcherinterpretability, human memory, brain computer interfaceI research in increasing reliability of interpretability methods for vision models and language models. My work includes research on model transparency, alongside practical experience making medicine discovery applications using AI and deploying ML systems using PyTorch and Kubeflow. Currently, I'm exploring PhD opportunities to deepen my research in interpretability, particularly focusing on understanding neural network knowledge encoding and decision-making processes.Explainable AIGenerative AILatent DiffusionText to SpeechDrug Discovery (AI)Genome EditingResearch & Publication
